Package entity.pickup

Class FruitPointPickup

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.pickup.Pickup
entity.pickup.FruitPointPickup
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollisionElement, EngineComponent
public class FruitPointPickup
extends Pickup
The FruitPointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and increase the players extra lives if any are missing (max. 3).
Author:
Harry Felton

  • Constructor Details

    • FruitPointPickup

      public FruitPointPickup​(PacmanGame game, int pX, int pY)
      Constructs the fruit pickup by choosing a random fruit sprite and using that when drawing the pickup
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance this pickup belongs to
      pX - The X position of the pickup
      pY - The Y position of the pickup

  • Method Details

    • collidedWithBy

      public boolean collidedWithBy​(java.awt.Rectangle collisionBox, CollisionElement source, java.awt.Rectangle infringedBoundary)
      This method will be executed when another entity intersects with this pickup. If intersected with by a PacmanEntity, the pickup will apply the effect (add score, destroy self, spawn text effects)
      Parameters:
      collisionBox - The collision box
      source - The source of the collision
      infringedBoundary - The boundary infringed by the collision
      Returns:
      Returns false as to not consume the collision event
      See Also:
      applyEffect(Entity)

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect​(Entity e)
      Applies this pickup effect to the PacmanEntity, if the entity provided is a PacmanEntity.
      Overrides:
      applyEffect in class Pickup
      Parameters:
      e - The entity the effect is being applied to

    • paintComponent

      public void paintComponent()
      Draws the pickup on screen
